column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////I've been to a good amount of steakhouses in Chicago
column2: and this one is easily my favorite. The atmosphere is perfect and so is the food. Started with a dozen oysters
column3: and their presentation was just as great as their taste. Followed them with a bone-in ribeye
column4: which was cooked to perfection. Hash browns and creamed spinach for sides
column5: and both were delectable. All the while
column6: the staff was extremely helpful and friendly.
